DECA 5k Fundraiser

To raise money for our school teachers, Westwood DECA organized a 5k Dash open to all community members. We had over 500 students, teachers, family, and other community members attend this special event raising almost $10k!

500+ Participants $10k+ Raised

AI Research

I will be working with Professor Nathalie Japkowicz at American University in developing an app that uses NLP to detect hate speech in social media posts. The goal will be to expand the application of the app to various demographics including Anti-Asian, Anti-Islamic, and Anti-Black.

NLP Hate-Speech Detection

Ethics Bowl Champions

Westwood High School emerged victorious at the 13th Annual UT Tyler Ethics Bowl, competing against teams from across Texas. The team advanced to nationals and won the Social Media Award.
